store_info.title: Andhra Bank ONE – UPI App
store_info.description:
Explore the world of mobile innovation with our Andhra Bank UPI App that turns your smartphone into a Bank for easy money transfers. This is a mobile solution that aims at less-cash and more digital society which leads to creation of new solutions in Banking and Financial Services.

Here's a quick guide to know about Andhra Bank UPI App:

- One Solution to operate multiple Bank accounts from single mobile app.
- Send money to any Bank account using “Virtual Payment Address” ('xxxx@andb'), a virtual identity like an email address, name, phone number etc. without sharing Account No and IFSC.
- Option to send money using Account No. and IFSC also.
- Request money from anyone using the Virtual Payment Address.
- Andhra Bank as well as Other Bank customers also can send or collect money using this UPI app.
- Can Lodge Transaction related grievances / complaints directly from app.
- Available 24 x 7 throughout the year, even on holidays.

Steps for Using the Andhra Bank UPI App.

· Create your Profile and Set application password of 6-digits.
· Add Bank account using Account Management option from Home Screen.
· Set Virtual Id for Bank account.
· Set MPIN of 6-digits.
· Use SEND and RECEIVE options to do transactions.

So get started and Grab your Virtual Payment Address…NOW! Before someone else take it.
store_info.short_description: Andhra Bank ONE – One App for all your Banking needs.
